channel.title: How do i stop ppl from logging into my server with a
channel.description: I would be very grateful if someone could tell me if there's a possible way to stop noobs from logging into my server with a cheat client and giving everyone 2147m and party hats because i really want my server's economy to be fair and you have to make your own money.

You need to find how to put a cheat protection on, I personally don’t know what it is.
Also I.P ban is pretty useless as the damage is already done and whats stopping someone else doing the same.
